title: Chris Martin
summary: Christopher Anthony John Martin[2] (born 2 March 1977)[3] is an English singer, songwriter, and multi-instrumentalist. He is the lead vocalist, pianist, and co-founder of the alternative rock band Coldplay. Born in Exeter, Devon, Martin went to University College London, where he formed the band Starfish with Jonny Buckland, Guy Berryman, and Will Champion, which was eventually renamed Coldplay in 1998.
